reasoning: Gastric cancer global incidence ~15 per 100k in 2005. Approximately 50% of gastric cancers present with metastatic disease at diagnosis, yielding ~7.5 per 100k for metastatic gastric carcinoma. Geographic variation is high (East Asia >> Western countries).
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
